briefdescription.para: Vertex buffer needs rewrite / resizing flag.
Subscribed to scene post update event flag.
Apply attribute changes that can not be applied immediately. Called after scene load or a network update.
Process octree raycast. May be called from a worker thread.
Calculate distance and prepare batches for rendering. May be called from worker thread(s), possibly re-entrantly.
Prepare geometry for rendering. Called from a worker thread if possible (no GPU update).
Return whether a geometry update is necessary, and if it can happen in a worker thread.

detaileddescription.para: Set material. The material should use a small negative depth bias to avoid Z-fighting. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum number of decal vertices. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set maximum number of decal vertex indices. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Set whether to optimize GPU buffer sizes according to current amount of decals. Default false, which will size the buffers according to the maximum vertices/indices. When true, buffers will be reallocated whenever decals are added/removed, which can be worse for performance. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

memberdef.argsstring: (Drawable *target, const Vector3 &worldPosition, const Quaternion &worldRotation, float size, float aspectRatio, float depth, const Vector2 &topLeftUV, const Vector2 &bottomRightUV, float timeToLive=0.0f, float normalCutoff=0.1f, unsigned subGeometry=M_MAX_UNSIGNED)
memberdef.name: AddDecal

briefdescription.para: Add a decal at world coordinates, using a target drawable's geometry for reference. If the decal needs to move with the target, the decal component should be created to the target's node. Return true if successful.

detaileddescription.para: Retur number of vertices in the decals. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Retur number of vertex indices in the decals. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return maximum number of decal vertices. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return maximum number of decal vertex indices. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether is optimizing GPU buffer sizes according to current amount of decals. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Get triangle faces from the target geometry.

briefdescription.para: Calculate UV coordinates for the decal.
Transform decal's vertices from the target geometry to the decal set local space.
Remove a decal by iterator and return iterator to the next decal.
Mark decals and the bounding box dirty.
Rewrite decal vertex and index buffers.
Update the batch (geometry type, shader data).
